com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2.se.tmch

Class TmchXMLUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2.se.tmch.TmchValidatingParser

  • public class TmchXMLUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This defines the operations to facilitate encoding / decoding signed mark data for tmch.

    • Method Detail

      • extractBase64EncodedPartFromSmdFile

        public byte[] extractBase64EncodedPartFromSmdFile(java.io.InputStream smdFileInputStream)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Extracts the base64 encoded part from the given SMD file input stream, part that is between delimiters "-----BEGIN ENCODED SMD-----\n" and "-----END ENCODED SMD-----"
        Parameters:
        smdFileInputStream - Input stream to the SMD file to parse
        Returns:
        The extracted base64 encoded part
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case the input stream cannot be read

                                   java.io.IOException
        Decodes the provided base64-encoded input stream into a decoded XML SMD data
        Parameters:
        encodedSignedMarkData - Input stream to the base64-encoded data to decode
        Returns:
        The decoded XML SMD data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case the input stream cannot be read
        org.apache.commons.codec.DecoderException - In case the stream cannot be decoded

                                                 org.apache.commons.codec.DecoderException
        Decodes and parses the provided base64-encoded input stream and loads it into a SignedMarkData bean

        Returns:
        The loaded SignedMarkData bean
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case the input stream cannot be read
        ParsingException - In case an error occurs while parsing
        org.apache.commons.codec.DecoderException - In case the stream cannot be decoded

      • validateEncodedSignedMarkData

        public void validateEncodedSignedMarkData(java.io.InputStream encodedSignedMarkData,
                                 java.util.Date dateForValidation)
                                   throws ParsingException,
                                          java.io.IOException,
                                          org.apache.commons.codec.DecoderException,
                                          javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                          javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException,
                                          java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                          java.security.cert.CertificateException,
                                          java.security.KeyStoreException,
                                          java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        Decodes and validates the provided base64-encoded input stream based on the provided date.
        Parameters:
        encodedSignedMarkData - Input stream to the base64-encoded smd to be validated.
        dateForValidation - The date against which the input SMD needs to be validated against.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case the input stream cannot be read
        ParsingException - In case an error occurs while parsing
        org.apache.commons.codec.DecoderException - In case the stream cannot be decoded
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException - if an exception occurs while parsing the decoded
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - if an exception occurs while parsing the decoded smd
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if an exception occurs while parsing the smd certificate
        java.security.cert.CertificateException - if an exception occurs while validating smd certificate
        java.security.KeyStoreException - if an exception occurs while validating smd certificate
        java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - if an exception occurs while validating smd certificate

                                          java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
